title: Wrap Cloud Code SDK with interactive prompting
overview:
The tool needs to orchestrate prompts through the Cloud Code SDK while allowing interactive clarification from users.

**Motivation:** Interactive clarifying questions from the agent lead to better results during workflow execution.

**Success criteria:**
- Cloud Code SDK is fully wrapped
- Agent can request/ask clarifying questions during prompt sessions
- Workflow orchestration through each loop step works

**Technical constraints:**
- Must wrap Cloud Code SDK
- Support interactive Q&A during workflow
